name: Riddle01
riddle: I sit on my throne,looking sick and old, But with help from Gandalf, again I feel bold.

name: Riddle02
riddle: My weary eyes have seen many years, in Rivendell I live,to the Fellowship, I provide a council but hope I have yet to give.

name: Riddle03
riddle: I like to eat mushroom and Ale I like to sip, I'm a troublesome lad when with my best friend Pip.
